ml_advantages: Can learn complex patterns from data
rule_based_advantages: Easier to update with expert knowledge
comparison_analysis.recommendation: Hybrid approach: Use rule-based for transparency, ML for complex edge cases

key_findings.finding_2: Best model: Gradient Boosting with 100.0% accuracy
key_findings.finding_3: ML vs Rule-Based: ML approach wins
key_findings.finding_4: Feature importance shows text features dominate over metadata
key_findings.finding_5: Hybrid approach recommended for optimal performance

conclusions.ml_feasibility: ML models successfully trained on clause data
conclusions.performance: ML achieves 100.0% accuracy on test set
conclusions.recommendation: Hybrid approach: Use rule-based for transparency, ML for complex edge cases
future_work: Build ensemble methods combining rule-based + ML
Add active learning for continuous improvement
